HighCode, thank you for everything you do.

V 7.5
A 8

Disappointing image quality. Graininess and aliasing present around edges, especially people's faces. Too much file space is wasted on subtitles in 28 languages.

@Highcode

Wow this is how you treat people? No, you're the one that's full of shit. If you don't like my honest rating that isn't 10 out of 10 you can try looking at real rips. Transformers is very high action, high CGI. Compare it to blu-ray, compare it to 10GB rips and you'll see yours falls flat. If you can't accept that, then you shouldn't be encoding.
